alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Roosevelt County; Southwest Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 11 at 2:29AM MDT until April 12 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Curry County, De Baca County, Roosevelt County, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, Chaves County Plains and Southwest Mountains. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Curry County; De Baca County; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Roosevelt County; Southwest Mountains
